name: 宋國明
objective:
RF 系統簡介、RF 設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF 濾波器設計、RF 主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與 RF 電源放大器設計等。
English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。
schedule:
Week 1 Course Introduction.
Week 2-4 Basic Concepts in RF Design
Week 5-6 Smith Chart
Week 7-8 Transceiver Architectures
Week 9 Midterm Exam.
Week 10-11 LNA
Week 12-13 Mixer
Week 14 Oscillator
Week 15-16 Frequency Synthesizer
Week 17 PA
Week 18 Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
(1). General Performance 20%.
(2). Midterm Exam. 40% (Open book).
(3). Final Exam. 40% (Open book).
materials:
(1).Behzad Razavi, RF Microelectronics,1998, (TEL：02-2365-1662 Book No. 10429)
(2).Reinhold Ludwig, Pavel Bretchko, RF Circuit Design Theory and Applications, 2000. (TEL：02-2290-0318, ISBN:0-13-095323-7)
